Description: Textile; fragment of braid; tablet weaving with warp brocading and weft brocading; purple wool with a repeated design of stylised flowers in yellow and green wool and undyed linen. Warp: S-spun wool, S-spun Z-ply linen Weft: S-spun linen, 17 picks/cm, Z-spun wool, ? picks/cm Edges: one selvedge, others fragmentary.
Curator's comments: History of use: probably used as a border. Technique not altogether clear. H. Granger-Taylor, 19/09/1989
Condition: Poor - conservation (unknown date): stuck to a sticky net.
